title: Wimbledon 2025: Speedy Shelton makes quick work of unfinished business
description: American tennis rising star Ben Shelton continues his Wimbledon journey!  Shelton battled through a rain-delayed match against Rinky Hijikata, ultimately securing a hard-fought victory and a spot in the third round.  His powerful serve, including three crucial aces in the final set, proved decisive.  Next up for Shelton is a challenging match against Marton Fucsovics.  Elsewhere in the tournament, Naomi Osaka's run ended with a loss to Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova.  Positive news for the mixed doubles came with Yuki Bhambri and Xinyu Jiang's win.  Stay tuned for more Wimbledon updates! Don't forget to like and subscribe for more tennis highlights.
